thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus Gives SNL's Leslie Jones Helpful Fashion Advice in New Promo ... - People Magazine

title: Miley Cyrus Gives SNL's Leslie Jones Helpful Fashion Advice in New Promo ... - People Magazine
text: Miley Cyrus knows a thing or two about making memorable fashion statements . The 22-year-old singer dished out some style advice to Saturday Night Live star Leslie Jones in a new season 41 promo, released on Thursday. "Miley, I love your style! What's your secret?" Jones asked the host and musical guest. "You know that saying before you leave the house you should take off one accessory? Well I do that and then put like 17 more," joked Cyrus. "That's hot!" the Ghostbusters actress responded. And to further up her fashion game, Jones sought for more tips and tricks, especially how to get more likes on Instagram . "Nipple pasties and zit cream, like the combo of the two has gotten me a lot of likes While there's no promises what outlandish costumes and nearly naked outfits will be seen, Miley's SNL teaser has cast member Taran Killam embracing nudity. A video posted by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Sep 30, 2015 at 5:57pm PDT A video posted by Miley Cyrus (@mileycyrus) on Oct 1, 2015 at 5:33pm PDT
